divs: Sighting DetailsAt approximatelt 10:30 PM, I observed a star like object moving from a SW to NE direction I first thought it was a satilited until it it suddenly disappeared. At 1AM I went back outside and saw another star like object traveling in almost the exact oppostie direction and I watch it until it also disappeared.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 3 other sightings in New York on or around July 4th 2011
Summary: I observed a star like object moving from a SW to NE direction
